metadata.title: CVE-2021-20284 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in GNU Binutils 2.35.1, where there is a heap-based bufferoverflow in _bfd_elf_slurp_secondary_reloc_section in elf.c due to thenumber of symbols not calculated correctly. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
